title: Senior Privileges (quartet)
info: Original blues.
Low brass quartet (recording has three trombones and baritone sax).
Difficulty: Medium (solo in 1st trombone, 1st trombone goes up to Bb4)

title: A Sinfonian Medley
info: Arrangement of songs from the Phi Mu Alpha songbook.
Standard instrumentation.
Difficulty: Hard (no improvisation, lead trumpet goes up to Eb6)

title: Cherokee
info: Arrangement, written for Clay Jenkins and the Ithaca College Jazz Ensemble.
Standard instrumentation or solo 5th trumpet.
Difficulty: Hard (improv in 2nd or 5th trumpet, alto, lead trumpet goes up to F6)

title: Mine Again
info: Alto saxophone, baritone voice, piano.
Difficulty: Medium for voice(G2-E4), easy for sax, piano.
Unperformed. MIDI recording available upon request.

title: Sonatina for Baritone Saxophone and Piano
info: Baritone saxophone, piano.
Difficulty: Hard (sax up to written A6)
Unperformed. MIDI recording available upon request.

recordings.http://ahwitz.com/media/baripiano.mp3: Better-quality audio recording of same performance.

title: Chanukah Klezmer Medley for Saxophone Quartet
info: SATB saxophones.
Difficulty: Hard (optional improv in SAT saxophones)

title: Three Klezmer Dances
info: Alto saxophone, cello, piano.
Difficulty: Hard for sax, piano (sax up to written C7), "This may be one of the hardest pieces I've ever played." for cello.

recordings.http://ahwitz.com/media/klezmer1.m4a: M4A recording of first movement available.
recordings.http://ahwitz.com/media/klezmer2.m4a: M4A recording of second movement available.
recordings.http://ahwitz.com/media/klezmer3.m4a: M4A recording of third movement available.

title: Fresca
info: Original latin song, written for the Canton Central High School Jazz Band.
Standard instrumentation, opt. french horn part for 4th trumpet or 1st trombone.
Difficulty: Easy/Medium (bossa improv in low reed and piano, samba improv in alto, lead trumpet goes up to A5)
MIDI recording available by request.

title: Senior Privileges (big band)
info: Arrangement of low brass quartet above, original blues.
Standard instrumentation.
Difficulty: Medium/Hard (improv in trumpet 2, large sax soli, lead trumpet goes up to Db6)
MIDI recording available by request.

title: When The Saints Go Marching In
info: Arrangement, written for John and Bob Sneider and the Ithaca College Jazz Ensemble.
Standard instrumentation, opt. solo 5th trumpet, opt. solo guitar.
Difficulty: Hard (improv in solo parts and drumset, lead trumpet goes up to F6)

title: Pages From an American Cookbook
info: Commissioned by Janice Murphy, clarinetist with the U.S. Marine Band
Soprano Bb clarinet, acoustic bass.
